mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM `pm_goods` g,pm_goods_rel_attribute_good ag,pm_goods_attribute a where g.goods_category_id=#{categoryId} and g.id=ag.goods_good_id and g.del_flag=0 and ag.del_flag=0 and a.del_flag=0 and a.id=ag.goods_attribute_id and a.type in(1,3,6,7) union all SELECT a.* FROM `pm_goods` g, pm_goods_rel_attribute_value_good ag, pm_goods_attribute a, pm_goods_attribute_value av WHERE g.id = ag.goods_id AND g.del_flag = 0 AND ag.del_flag = 0 AND a.del_flag = 0 AND av.del_flag = 0 AND av.id = ag.goods_attribute_value_id AND a.id = av.product_attribute_id AND g.goods_category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT b.id,b.name FROM pm_goods_rel_attribute_category a, pm_goods_attribute b where a.del_flag = 0 and b.type=#{type} and a.goods_category_id= #{categoryId} and a.goods_attribute_id = b.id and b.enabled = 1

select b.id,b.name from pm_goods_rel_attribute_category a ,pm_goods_attribute b where a.goods_category_id = #{categoryId} and a.goods_attribute_id = b.id and b.type =7 and b.enabled = 1 and a.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY b.id,b.name order by b.id

select id,name,type from pm_goods_attribute where del_flag=0 AND enabled=1 and type in
#{type}

select DISTINCT d.name as category_name,b.id as brand_id,b.logo_image as brand_picture,b.name as brand_name from pm_goods a,pm_goods_attribute b,pm_goods_rel_attribute_good c,pm_goods_category d where a.goods_category_id = #{categoryId} and b.id = c.goods_attribute_id and c.goods_good_id = a.id and b.type = 8 and a.del_flag=0 and b.del_flag=0 and c.del_flag=0 and d.del_flag=0 and d.id = a.goods_category_id
select a.id as categoryId,a.name as categoryName from pm_goods_category a where a.del_flag=0 and a.parent_id in(SELECT id from pm_goods_category where parent_id =#{categoryId})

select a.id as goods_id,a.name as goods_name,c.sales_volume,c.line_price,c.sell_price as sale_price from pm_goods a, pm_goods_rel_attribute_good as b,pm_goods_sku as c where b.goods_attribute_id = #{brandId} and a.goods_category_id = #{categoryId} and b.goods_good_id = a.id and c.goods_id = a.id and c.sell_price = (select min(sell_price) from pm_goods_sku as d where d.goods_id =a.id and del_flag=0) and a.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag = 0
order by sale_price
order by c.sales_volume
order by c.sales_volume
${sortWay}
